channel.title: CVE Feed for Automattic -- Sensei LMS – Online Courses, Quizzes, & Learning
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Automattic -- Sensei LMS – Online Courses, Quizzes, & Learning

item.title: CVE-2023-50875|2024-06-04T17:18:05.316Z -- automattic -- sensei%20lms%20%E2%80%93%20online%20courses%2C%20quizzes%2C%20%26%20learning
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Automattic Sensei LMS – Online Courses, Quizzes, & Learning allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Sensei LMS – Online Courses, Quizzes, & Learning: from n/a through 4.17.0.
